meta.source: Official Census subjects + ACS definitions + expert curation

concepts.name: HousingUnits
concepts.definition: Total number of housing units in an area

concepts.name: HousingTenure
concepts.definition: Whether housing units are owner-occupied or renter-occupied

concepts.name: HomeownershipRate
concepts.definition: Percentage of housing units that are owner-occupied

concepts.name: RenterOccupied
concepts.definition: Housing units occupied by renters

concepts.name: VacancyRate
concepts.definition: Percentage of housing units that are vacant

concepts.name: OccupancyStatus
concepts.definition: Whether housing units are occupied or vacant

concepts.name: HouseholdCrowding
concepts.definition: Housing units with more than one person per room

concepts.name: OccupantsPerRoom
concepts.definition: Average number of occupants per room

concepts.name: Bedrooms
concepts.definition: Number of bedrooms in housing units

concepts.name: Rooms
concepts.definition: Total number of rooms in housing units

concepts.name: UnitsInStructure
concepts.definition: Type of structure housing units are in

concepts.name: MobileHomes
concepts.definition: Housing units that are mobile homes or trailers

concepts.name: SingleFamilyHomes
concepts.definition: Housing units in single-family structures

concepts.name: MultifamilyHousing
concepts.definition: Housing units in buildings with multiple units

concepts.name: ApartmentBuildings
concepts.definition: Housing units in apartment buildings

concepts.name: MedianHomeValue
concepts.definition: Median value of owner-occupied housing units

concepts.name: MedianRent
concepts.definition: Median gross rent for renter-occupied housing units

concepts.name: HousingCosts
concepts.definition: Monthly housing costs for homeowners and renters

concepts.name: HousingCostBurden
concepts.definition: Percentage of income spent on housing costs

concepts.name: RentBurden
concepts.definition: Percentage of income spent on rent for renter households

concepts.name: SevereHousingCostBurden
concepts.definition: Households spending more than 50% of income on housing

concepts.name: SelectedMonthlyOwnerCosts
concepts.definition: Total monthly costs for homeowners

concepts.name: HouseholdMortgage
concepts.definition: Monthly mortgage payments and mortgage status

concepts.name: MortgageStatus
concepts.definition: Whether housing units have a mortgage

concepts.name: PropertyTaxes
concepts.definition: Annual property tax payments

concepts.name: HomeInsurance
concepts.definition: Annual homeowners insurance costs

concepts.name: UtilityCosts
concepts.definition: Monthly utility costs for housing

concepts.name: AffordableHousing
concepts.definition: Housing affordable to low and moderate income households

concepts.name: SubsidizedHousing
concepts.definition: Housing units receiving government assistance

concepts.name: HousingAffordabilityIndex
concepts.definition: Measure of housing affordability in an area

concepts.name: RentStabilized
concepts.definition: Rental units with rent stabilization or control

concepts.name: HousingVouchers
concepts.definition: Households receiving housing choice vouchers

concepts.name: FirstTimeBuyers
concepts.definition: Recent home purchases by first-time buyers

concepts.name: HousingEquity
concepts.definition: Homeowner equity in housing units

concepts.name: RentControlled
concepts.definition: Rental units under rent control programs

concepts.name: HousingAge
concepts.definition: Year housing units were built

concepts.name: YearBuilt
concepts.definition: Construction period of housing structures

concepts.name: YearMovedIn
concepts.definition: Year householder moved into current unit

concepts.name: HousingCondition
concepts.definition: Physical condition and amenities of housing units

concepts.name: PlumbingFacilities
concepts.definition: Availability of complete plumbing facilities

concepts.name: KitchenFacilities
concepts.definition: Availability of complete kitchen facilities

concepts.name: HeatingFuel
concepts.definition: Primary fuel used for heating housing units

concepts.name: TelephoneService
concepts.definition: Availability of telephone service

concepts.name: InternetAccess
concepts.definition: Household access to internet services

concepts.name: ComputerAccess
concepts.definition: Household access to computers

concepts.name: AirConditioning
concepts.definition: Availability of air conditioning systems

concepts.name: WaterHeater
concepts.definition: Type of water heating system

concepts.name: Insulation
concepts.definition: Quality of housing insulation

concepts.name: WindowType
concepts.definition: Type and efficiency of windows

concepts.name: RoofCondition
concepts.definition: Condition of housing roof

concepts.name: ElectricalSystems
concepts.definition: Adequacy of electrical systems

concepts.name: AccessibilityFeatures
concepts.definition: Housing features for disabled residents

concepts.name: SafetyFeatures
concepts.definition: Housing safety equipment and features

concepts.name: EnergyEfficiency
concepts.definition: Energy efficiency of housing units

concepts.name: GreenBuilding
concepts.definition: Environmentally sustainable housing features

concepts.name: HistoricHousing
concepts.definition: Housing units in historic districts or landmarks

concepts.name: HousingViolations
concepts.definition: Housing code violations and maintenance issues

concepts.name: LeadPaint
concepts.definition: Presence of lead-based paint in housing

concepts.name: AsbestosPrecence
concepts.definition: Presence of asbestos in housing materials

concepts.name: FloodZone
concepts.definition: Housing located in flood-prone areas

concepts.name: PublicHousing
concepts.definition: Government-owned rental housing for low-income families

concepts.name: Section8Housing
concepts.definition: Housing units accepting Section 8 vouchers

concepts.name: LowIncomeHousingTax
concepts.definition: Housing financed through tax credit programs

concepts.name: AffordableHousingTrust
concepts.definition: Housing supported by affordable housing trust funds

concepts.name: HousingAuthority
concepts.definition: Housing managed by public housing authorities

concepts.name: CommunityLandTrust
concepts.definition: Housing in community land trust arrangements

concepts.name: HousingCooperatives
concepts.definition: Housing owned and managed cooperatively

concepts.name: CondominiumOwnership
concepts.definition: Housing owned as condominium units

concepts.name: ManufacturedHousing
concepts.definition: Factory-built housing units

concepts.name: TinyHomes
concepts.definition: Very small housing units under 500 square feet

concepts.name: AccessoryDwellingUnits
concepts.definition: Secondary housing units on single-family properties

concepts.name: StudentHousing
concepts.definition: Housing designated for college students

concepts.name: SeniorHousing
concepts.definition: Housing designed for elderly residents

concepts.name: TransitionalHousing
concepts.definition: Temporary housing for homeless populations

concepts.name: SupportiveHousing
concepts.definition: Housing with support services for special populations
